title: Techno-economic analysis of a solar-driven biomass pyrolysis plant for bio-oil and biochar production
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00450G, Paper

Muhammad Ahsan Amjed, Filip Sobic, Matteo Carmelo Romano, Tiziano Faravelli, Marco Binotti
Pyrolysis has become one of the most attractive options to convert carbonaceous biomass into bio-oil or biochar. This paper explores a novel solar pyrolysis process intended to produce both bio-oil...
